option.name: notice
option.value: Last Modified: $file.lastModified.day/$file.lastModified.month/$file.lastModified.year $file.lastModified.hour24:$file.lastModified.minute:$file.lastModified.second, Copyright (c) $originalComment.match("Copyright \(c\) (\d+)", 1, "-", "$today.year")$today.year . Kamran N. Farvin
